x-kubernetes-validations.rule: !('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.destinationFlowConfig) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.destinationFlowConfig))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.sourceFlowConfig) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.sourceFlowConfig))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.task) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.task))

!('*' in self.managementPolicies || 'Create' in self.managementPolicies || 'Update' in self.managementPolicies) || has(self.forProvider.triggerConfig) || (has(self.initProvider) && has(self.initProvider.triggerConfig))
